page.title: 17 LIFE STYLES
page.content: We thought that a typical life in the lives of two people in the area may provide interesring reading and therefore we introduce a well-known farmer and a school boy. {A Day in the Life of a Farmer,June '85 I rise at 7.00a.m. and at 7.30 meet the men and allocate jobs then I check the crops and the stock. Between 9.00 and 10.00 I have breakfast and work in my office. Around 11.00a.m I visit the fields. I lunch at 1.00p.m. and read the daily papers. By 2.00 I am back in the office. Between 3.00 and 6.00 I work outside on the farm or visit the workers. At 6.00 I return to the office and work. Then I read farming magazines and watch T.V. until 9.00. I have dinner at 9.00 and retire to bed at about 10.30p.m..
